channel.title: The lore and habits of the Effinghamburgher
channel.description: Recent content on The lore and habits of the Effinghamburgher

item.title: About
item.description: Effingham, Carroll County, New Hampshire is a strange and wonderous little town in the foothills of the White Mountains. Our air is fresh, our trees are green, our politicians are corrupt and our cops are crooked.
